name: APEX Unleash RichTextEditor
description:
This plug-in makes it possible to add important features that IMHO simply lacks in the RichTextEditor: - Load and save CLOB - It can remove dangerous HTML code from the CLOB or you can escaped the whole CLOB - If images are inserted into the RTE via Drag'n'Drop or screenshots are inserted into the RTE via CTRL+V, they are loaded into the database as BLOB and only referenced in the CLOB.
Restrictions: You can only add one RTE Item in Affected Elements in Dyanmic Action. When using Multiple RTE Items on one page then you need to add one Unleash RTE Plug-in Dynamic Action for each item!

Important clarification: My work in the development team of Oracle APEX is in no way related to my open source projects or the plug-ins here on apex.world! All plug-ins are built in my spare time and are not supported by Oracle!
